actions.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A004) Agreed to without objection.
Amendment in the nature of a substitute reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A004) Agreed to without objection.

description: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 548, the amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 116-30, modified by the amendment printed in Part C of House Report 116-200 is considered as adopted.
purpose: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 548, the amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 116-30, modified by the amendment printed in Part C of House Report 116-200 is considered as adopted.
